item.description:
Every other month, JP Cohousing invites folks interested in cohousing to come over for brunch. It's a great way for us to make new friends, and for others to learn about cohousing. We chat over brunch then take you for a tour of our Common House which includes the kid's room, living room, Great Room, kitchen, mailroom, offices, rumpus room, laundry, and guest suite, and some units, if possible. If you are new to cohousing, you may want to learn more at http://www.cohousing.... To find out more about JP Cohousing in particular, consult http://jpcohousing.or...

Please come directly to the Common House which is the big building you see across the interior yard when you first come in the Cornwall Street entrance. Come in through the vestibule and turn left into our Great Room. We will be there to welcome you.
item.how_to_find_us: Please come directly to the Common House and ask for Jeney
item.name: Valentine's Day Brunch at JP Cohousing
